title: Decommission Old Service
description: An old, legacy microservice is being replaced by a new one and needs to be safely decommissioned.

tasks.description: Verify that all traffic has been migrated from the old service to the new one.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the old service is receiving zero traffic.

tasks.description: Delete the deployment configuration for the old service from the orchestration tool (e.g., Kubernetes).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent removes the service from the cluster.

tasks.description: Remove the old service's code repository and CI/CD pipeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent cleans up all related assets to prevent accidental redeployment.
